content: There are currently more people sitting on the floor than in seats in the recitation and it is uncomfortably cramped. Could more recitation slots open up to accommodate the sheer volume of people?
subject: Open up more recitations?

content:
Hello,

Sorry again about the lack of space in our recitation rooms. I'll be bringing this up to the staff at our next meeting to try to get a larger room or more sections.


@Ana Bell 

Thanks,

Anthony
